Text: Carole Hayman:  As Associate Director, she directed plays by Sarah Daniels, Andrea Dunbar, GE Newman, Fay Weldon and Sue Townsend, including "Ripen our Darkness" and "Byrthrite" by Sarah Daniels and Bazaar and Rummage and The Great Celestial Cow by Sue Townsend.
